application.properties info.body:
server.port=${1:port}
server.context-path=/${2:path}
caf.ms.swagger.enabled=true
caf.ms.app.group=apepower
caf.ms.app.name=${3:appName}
caf.ms.app.version=2.0
caf.ms.app.host=localhost:${server.port}
caf.ms.app.context=${server.context-path}/api
caf.ms.app.resourcePackage=cn.apepower.${4:package}
caf.ms.app.description=nothing
caf.ms.app.contact.name=Ocean.Ren
caf.ms.app.contact.email=sudazhangyu@qq.com

# 控制台启用
caf.ms.druid.enabled=true

# JDBC
spring.datasource.type=com.alibaba.druid.pool.DruidDataSource
spring.datasource.driver-class-name=com.mysql.jdbc.Driver
spring.datasource.url=jdbc:mysql://faa.hainabo.com:3306/water?characterEncoding=utf8&useSSL=false
spring.datasource.username=water
spring.datasource.password=Passw0rd

# Datasource
spring.datasource.druid.initial-size=5
spring.datasource.druid.min-idle=5
spring.datasource.druid.max-active=50
spring.datasource.druid.max-wait=60000
spring.datasource.druid.time-between-eviction-runs-millis=60000
spring.datasource.druid.min-evictable-idle-time-millis=300000
spring.datasource.druid.validation-query=SELECT now()
spring.datasource.druid.validation-query-timeout=100000
spring.datasource.druid.test-while-idle=true
spring.datasource.druid.test-on-borrow=false
spring.datasource.druid.test-on-return=false
spring.datasource.druid.pool-prepared-statements=true
spring.datasource.druid.max-pool-prepared-statement-per-connection-size=20
spring.datasource.druid.connection-properties=druid.stat.mergeSql=true;druid.stat.slowSqlMillis=5000;config.decrypt=false;config.decrypt.key=MFwwDQYJKoZIhvcNAQEBBQADSwAwSAJBAK3NMvApkfDoRSREL2QilMq7nwNlFdKcrM61e5KjX18e8wmIt7BqsYcMpHGzrF2XMN6cb8A6InawZn+eWcke/zsCAwEAAQ==
;config.decrypt.key=MFwwDQYJKoZIhvcNAQEBBQADSwAwSAJBAK3NMvApkfDoRSREL2QilMq7nwNlFdKcrM61e5KjX18e8wmIt7BqsYcMpHGzrF2XMN6cb8A6InawZn+eWcke/zsCAwEAAQ==
spring.datasource.druid.use-global-data-source-stat=true

# filter
spring.datasource.druid.filters=stat,wall,log4j,config
spring.datasource.druid.web-stat-filter.enabled=true
spring.datasource.druid.web-stat-filter.url-pattern=/*
spring.datasource.druid.web-stat-filter.exclusions=*.js,*.gif,*.jpg,*.png,*.css,*.ico,/druid/*
spring.datasource.druid.web-stat-filter.session-stat-enable=true
spring.datasource.druid.web-stat-filter.session-stat-max-count=1000
spring.datasource.druid.web-stat-filter.principal-session-name=user
spring.datasource.druid.web-stat-filter.principal-cookie-name=user
spring.datasource.druid.web-stat-filter.profile-enable=true

# 如果spring.datasource.druid.aop-patterns要代理的类没有定义interface请设置spring.aop.proxy-target-class=true
spring.aop.proxy-target-class=true  
spring.datasource.druid.aop-patterns=com.hainabo.mgcmall.api.*
# wall
spring.datasource.druid.filter.wall.enabled=true
spring.datasource.druid.filter.wall.db-type=mysql
spring.datasource.druid.filter.wall.config.delete-allow=true
spring.datasource.druid.filter.wall.config.drop-table-allow=false
spring.datasource.druid.filter.wall.config.delete-where-alway-true-check=false
spring.datasource.druid.filter.wall.config.rename-table-allow=false
spring.datasource.druid.filter.wall.config.update-where-alay-true-check=false
spring.datasource.druid.filter.wall.config.alter-table-allow=true
spring.datasource.druid.filter.slf4j.enabled=true

# 监控配置
spring.datasource.druid.stat-view-servlet.enabled=true
spring.datasource.druid.stat-view-servlet.url-pattern=/druid/*
spring.datasource.druid.stat-view-servlet.reset-enable=true
spring.datasource.druid.stat-view-servlet.login-username=druid
spring.datasource.druid.stat-view-servlet.login-password=Passw0rd
spring.datasource.druid.stat-view-servlet.allow=
spring.datasource.druid.stat-view-servlet.deny=
spring.jpa.database=mysql
spring.jpa.hibernate.ddl-auto=update
spring.jpa.show-sql=true
spring.jpa.hibernate.use-new-id-generator-mappings=true
logging.level.root=info
logging.level.cn.apepower=debug
spring.devtools.restart.enabled=false
spring.freemarker.allow-request-override=false
spring.freemarker.cache=true
spring.freemarker.check-template-location=true
spring.freemarker.charset=UTF-8
spring.freemarker.content-type=text/html
spring.freemarker.expose-request-attributes=false
spring.freemarker.expose-session-attributes=false
spring.freemarker.expose-spring-macro-helpers=false
spring.redis.host=faa.hainabo.com
spring.redis.password=
spring.redis.pool.max-active=8
spring.redis.pool.max-idle=8
spring.redis.pool.max-wait=-1
spring.redis.pool.min-idle=0
spring.redis.port=6379
#management.security.enabled=false
water.scheduled.TaskOne
